actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works.

official_title: Resolution providing for a review by the Board of Engineers for Rivers and Harbors of the report of the Chief of Engineers on the Polecat Creek, Okla.

summary.text: Reqeusts the Board of Engineers for Rivers and Harbors, to review the report of the Chief of Engineers on the Polecat Creek, Oklahoma, published as House Document Numbered 290, Eightieth Congress, first session, with the view to the consideration of future water resource needs of the area and with particular respect to flood control on mumicipal and industrial water supply and other purposes, in addition to reviewing the authorized purposes for which the existing Heyburn Reservoir on Polecat Creek and the channel improvement on Rock Creek and Polecat Creek are being operated and maintained.

titles.title: Resolution providing for a review by the Board of Engineers for Rivers and Harbors of the report of the Chief of Engineers on the Polecat Creek, Okla.
